info.name: Eventplace API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Eventplace application including Auth, Users, Upload, EventType, ServiceCategory, SubCategory, Amenities, and Listings endpoints

item.name: Auth

request.description: Register a new user with email and password
Login with email and password
Login or register using Google OAuth
Logout user by invalidating refresh token
Generate new access and refresh tokens using refresh token
Send password reset email to user
Reset user password using token from email
Send email verification link to logged-in user
Verify user email using token from email
Accept user invitation and complete registration

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, password management, and email verification

item.name: Users

request.description: Create a new user (requires manageUsers permission)
Get all users with pagination and filters (requires manageUsers permission)
Get currently logged-in user's profile
Update currently logged-in user's profile
Get user details by user ID (requires manageUsers permission)
Update user details by user ID (requires manageUsers permission)
Delete user by user ID (requires manageUsers permission)

item.description: User management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting users

item.name: Event Types

request.description: Create a new event type (requires manageUsers permission)
Get all event types with pagination and search
Get all event type names for dropdown selection (only returns _id and name)
Get event type details by ID
Update event type by ID (requires manageUsers permission)
Delete event type by ID (requires manageUsers permission)

item.description: Event type management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting event types

item.name: Service Categories

request.description: Create a new service category (requires manageUsers permission)
Get all service categories (non-deleted only)
Get service category details by ID
Update service category by ID (requires manageUsers permission). Automatically deletes old icon from storage when Icon is updated.
Soft delete service category by ID (requires manageUsers permission). Sets isDeleted to true.

item.description: Service category management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting service categories with icon management

item.name: Sub Categories

request.description: Create a new sub category (requires manageUsers permission)
Get all sub categories with pagination and filters

item.name: Get Sub Categories by Service Category

request.description: Get all sub categories for a specific service category ID
Get sub category details by ID
Update sub category by ID (requires manageUsers permission)
Delete sub category by ID (requires manageUsers permission). Hard delete.

item.description: Sub category management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting sub categories linked to service categories

item.name: Amenities

request.description: Create a new amenities (requires manageUsers permission)
Get all amenities with optional filters and pagination
Get amenities names for dropdown (returns id and name only)
Get amenities by ID
Update amenities by ID (requires manageUsers permission)
Delete amenities by ID (requires manageUsers permission). Soft delete with isDeleted flag.

item.description: Amenities management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting amenities

item.name: Listings

body.raw:
{
  "type": "venue",
  "name": "Grand Ballroom",
  "hostingCompany": "Luxury Events Ltd",
  "shortSummary": "Beautiful venue for weddings and corporate events",
  "descrption": "A stunning ballroom with modern amenities and classic elegance",
  "location": {
    "address": "123 Main Street",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "country": "USA",
    "zipCode": "10001",
    "coordinates": [-74.0060, 40.7128],
    "latitude": 40.7128,
    "longitude": -74.0060
  },
  "media": [
    {
      "url": "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
      "type": "image",
      "key": "venue/image1.jpg"
    }
  ],
  "serviceDays": [
    {
      "day": "Monday",
      "startTime": "09:00",
      "endTime": "22:00",
      "price": 5000
    }
  ],
  "vendorId": "{{userId}}",
  "area": {
    "value": 5000,
    "unit": "sqft"
  },
  "maxSeatingCapacity": 300,
  "maxStandingCapacity": 500,
  "rooms": 3,
  "cleaning": "include",
  "catering": "exclude",
  "outsideFoodAllowed": true,
  "alcoholAllowed": true,
  "inhouseBar": false,
  "timeZone": "America/New_York",
  "basePriceRange": "$5000-$10000",
  "venueStyle": "modern",
  "layouts": ["banquet", "theater"]
}

request.description: Create a new listing. Set type to 'venue' or 'vendor' (requires manageUsers permission)

query.description: Search across name, description, address, etc.
Filter by status: pending, approved, rejected
Filter by verification: pending, verified, unverified
Filter by amenities IDs (can be array)
Filter by venue styles (can be array)
Filter by layout types (can be array)
Filter by event type IDs (can be array)

request.description: Get all venues with aggregation (amenities, subcategories, vendor data) and pagination

query.description: Search across name, description, address, etc.
Filter by status: pending, approved, rejected
Filter by verification: pending, verified, unverified
Filter by type: venue or vendor
Filter by amenities IDs (can be array)
Filter by venue styles (can be array)
Filter by layout types (can be array)
Filter by event type IDs (can be array)

request.description: Get all vendors with aggregation (subcategories, vendor data) and pagination
Get a single listing (venue or vendor) by ID with populated amenities, subcategories, and vendor data

item.name: Get Listings by Vendor User ID

query.description: Filter by type: venue or vendor

request.description: Get all listings for a specific vendor user with optional type filter and pagination

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Grand Ballroom Updated",
  "shortSummary": "Updated summary for the venue",
  "maxSeatingCapacity": 350,
  "status": "approved",
  "VerificationStatus": "verified"
}

request.description: Update a listing by ID. Cannot change type after creation. (requires manageUsers permission)
Delete a listing by ID (soft delete - sets isDeleted to true). (requires manageUsers permission)

item.description: Listings management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting venue and vendor listings with aggregation and pagination support

item.name: Upload
Multipart Upload

request.description: Initiate multipart upload for large files. Returns uploadId to be used in subsequent requests.
Generate presigned URLs for uploading file chunks. Returns array of URLs for each chunk (1-1000 chunks).
Complete the multipart upload after all chunks have been uploaded

item.description: Multipart upload endpoints for large files (videos, large documents)

request.description: Upload a single file using base64 encoded content or raw data
Upload a file from local file system path
Upload JSON data as a file. Data can be object, array, string, number, or boolean.
Download file from AWS S3 using object key

item.description: File upload and download endpoints supporting multipart uploads for large files and single file uploads
